mapper.sql: id, serialno, imei, uuid, model, idfa, uk_version, del_status
mapper.select:
select
from zy_device_fix_info where serialno = #{serialno} and imei = #{imei} and uuid = #{uuid} and model = #{model} and idfa = #{idfa} and del_status = 0 limit 1
